name: SpiritAlchemist - Epic MegaJam 2022
description:
Teamname: BasAnderson

Controls - 

WASD to move

Left click to pick up object and to place in cauldron

F to interact with cupboards

Video - SpiritAlchemist Epic MegaJam 2022 submission - YouTube

Description

You have awoken in your home as an alchemist, someone is breaking the barrier to the spirit world, and if you do not fix it the world and the spirit world will be merged forever.

Used Assets and Content:

Minotaur model: Minotaur Pack in Characters - UE Marketplace (unrealengine.com)

Decoration items / building textures: Stylized Fantasy Provencal in Environments - UE Marketplace (unrealengine.com)

Other Decorational objects: Low Poly Medieval Interior and Constructions in Environments - UE Marketplace (unrealengine.com)

Knight D Pelegrini 3d model - Mixamo

Underground basement texture & roofing texture - Wood Shingles 001 – Stylized | 3D TEXTURES 

Niagara particle effects - Niagara Mega VFX Pack vol. 1 in Visual Effects - UE Marketplace (unrealengine.com)

Music & sound effects are all from - Music for Games | We Love Indies
